X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=190115458; y=jNLRXunEKDE6wtY9haO_fTrmlXKVoYdeKDaME7SNvSI0NuZZe6vE5U2UpIDqcmN3fxT6dtlR43xupIo

Ken,

I'm wondering if you had any detail on the food placements you used f=
or your dominance tournament in the original competitive coevolution robot =
duel? I'm looking over the paper "The Dominance Tournament Method of Monito=
ring Progress in Coevolution", and it gives a little more detail on the app=
roach taken. I'm still fuzzy on how you arrange the food items to get 144 p=
ositions per starting side, for 288 total evaluations. 

I suppose it's not=
 critical for my purposes to *exactly* recreate the layouts as long as the =
dominance tournament works, but if you have any documentation detailing the=
 exact locations I might as well throw them in there for good measure. 


-=
Drew Kirkpatrick
